setIldaFormat(int) - Method in class Ilda.IldaFrame
Set the Ilda version this frame uses. 0 = 3D, palette 1 = 2D, palette 4 = 3D, RGB 5 = 3D, RGB Internally, all frames are 3D and use RGB.
